thread.title: Microsoft updates Windows 10: adds features, addresses clean install license nightmare

title: Microsoft updates Windows 10: adds features, addresses clean install license nightmare
text:
Microsoft updates Windows 10: adds features, addresses clean install license nightmare 
Published By: Extremetech.com - Today 
Microsoft continues to add a broad array of features to its Windows builds for Insiders. Essentially, think of this as an extended beta test...
